channel.title: golang on Let's Code
channel.description: Recent content in golang on Let's Code

item.title: Starting a New Ambitious Project
item.description: For a very short time, I used the Spacemacs emacs distribution. It’s very nice, but I ended up backing to vim and eventually, I moved to VS Code. Code editors away, when I was using Spacemacs, I found the Magit git client.

item.title: json: unmarshal custom date formats
item.description: When we are building a JSON API, many times we have to deal with dates that we can’t have control of the layout.

item.title: Variadic functions in Go
item.description: Variadic functions allows you to have a variable number of arguments. Let’s see how.
